channel.title: Combat level and skill leveling help
channel.description:
okai well recently on my delta based server, ive added working pouches blah blah blah, gives exp to use, but i want to change it so that farming gives you combat lvls, e.g every 8 farm lvls = 1 cb lvl (basically tryin to add summoning)
any help would be nice :)

item.title: Combat level and skill leveling help
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

mhmm, i coulda guessed that, but where is this all located? :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2009, 06:59:48 pm[/size][hr]EPIC EDIT:

WORKS WOOOOT! i set the .025d to 0.247 and now when player reachs 99 farm, they get 138 cb thx alot m8

Read full topic
item.source: Combat level and skill leveling help

item.title: Combat level and skill leveling help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Add farming to the combat calculation the same way prayer is.

Read full topic
